content.prompt: Which of the following general claims does the author make regarding the background of European overseas expansion?

choices.label: It was facilitated by states adopting a feudal governmental structure.
It was a result of the growth of the Habsburg Empire.
It was an outcome of the conflict between England and France.
It emerged from the consolidation of central governments.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
